page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: Our local policeman is based at Staunton and he is responsible for{law {and order}in eight {parishes}.For his job he sometimes goes to accidents or questions people who might have seen them occur.He drives a motorbike and he has a radio on the back to tell him if there has been an accident or if he is needed elsewhere.His work involves going to schools and talking to children and also taking them for cycling proficiency lessons.He is very busy and sometimes he has days off. Then you must contact another station or you can leave a message on an answering machine if it is not that important.Our policeman said that there is very little {vandalism}in our area but traffic offences keep him busy.We like to think that our { {Village Policeman}is our friend.
